Reviews.Title: “Great hotel in a great location”
Reviews.Author: Merrimac54
Reviews.Content: overall hotel value discounted rate happy 6 yr daughter share double extra cost spacious bed laid bathroom comment bathroom fittings bit broken shower door shower hed hair drier fixed wasnt friendly woman looking breakfast superb location

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel & Location if Price is Right”
Reviews.Author: GNCSI
Reviews.Content: hotel due offer dates ago clean comfortable staff helpful courteous breakfast adequate wireless free looking hotel looking centrally located hotel close metro shopping center vatican excel fits bill

Reviews.Title: “A memorable stay!”
Reviews.Author: Brian C
Reviews.Content: wife returned night stay 3 star hotel excel rome san pietro hotel located block piazza 10 minutes stpeters square wonderful hotel excellent staff bright modern spotless fantastic breakfast location perfect 3 4 night break thoroughly recommend

Reviews.Title: “good enough if the price is right”
Reviews.Author: zaloupa
Reviews.Content: 5 min vatican city 15min foot centre town near bus station metro employees polite helpfull spoke english breakfast little poor eat beautifull nice bed tv couple bathroom size wasnt renovation wouldnt talk worth money offer period 70 euro day

Reviews.Title: “Very comfortable hotel, perfect location”
Reviews.Author: p6403240
Reviews.Content: nice litle hotel location metro 600m basilica di san pietro located apartment building else dont judge hotel appearance outside building pleasant modern helpfulfriendly staff clean comfortable electric kettle cups tea coffeewe didnt view 109 quiet wifi free connection breakfast hot meals didnt little bit overpriced rome

Reviews.Title: “Highly recommended”

Reviews.Content: arrived excel st peters series mistakes hotel nearby trip italy centered week tuscany trip planned nights rome nights reserved fabio massimo hotel chance checked email tuscany found message fabio cancelled reservations error offered similar hotel excel error excel st peters learn reservations night duty calmly heart invited enjoy orange juice pastries arranged hotel nights available final night rome actually stated excel appreciative professionalism courtesy breakfast wondeful loved tuscany strolling piazza cappacino pastry morning eventually missed healthier breakfast excel st peters fresh fruit yogurt cereal additon course usual deadly delicious italian treats real treat

Reviews.Title: “DON´T JUDGE A BOOK BY IT´S COVER (OR A HOTEL BY IT´S ENTRANCE)”
Reviews.Author: JUSTINE27
Reviews.Content: clean modern hotel quiet location corner st square vatican museum entry hotel unusual gate grubby lobby residential apartments located upper floors entry excel ground floor door it´s clean modern friendly welcome staff lovely counted 4 receptionists duty times 2 girls service breakfast bar various people housekeeping pleasant efficient jobs 123 spacious 3 modern fixtures view sky day sleepy night missing opinion tea coffee facilities liked breakfast appreciated available 1030am red orange juice delicious pastries fresh buffet items constantly replaced busy waitress brings hot drinks table located 1st floor there´s glass floor lift vertigo run it´s money return tomorrow
